# SOP/CORS tests.
# Anything with multiple windows or workers is disabled.
#

# Cobalt does not support HTTP cache.

basic.htm,PASS

# remote-origin.htm requires iframe support.

request-headers.htm,PASS
response-headers.htm,PASS
